According to Google, his new responsibilities will involve focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Eric Schmidt will also continue to act as an advisor to Page and Sergey Brin . left the door open to running for governor. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.
